title: New Champion Bard Discussion about his legs
body:
Ok so after looking over Bard's Champion art and further researching Bard as a champion of the league him such as his voice being only sounds from his instrument. Other unique things about his character such as being the first and only true roaming support due to his passive and heal. But those we will find out upon his release. the thing that i find odd about Bard is his legs more specifically below his knees i don't know if this is the same for the full length of his legs due to clothing but his legs at least what is visible look artificial like prosthetic limbs.

I want too know others point of view on this topic if only it's a rather small compared to Bard's over all character and what he will be.

replies.body: Doesn't he float? Maybe the little bumps on the leg are magical magics that make him float.
He flies when he gets enough movespeed (usually from Chimes). But he runs really strangely, something like a really cartoony fat guy walk...
